parameters.name: Name of winning actor or actress.
parameters.birth_y: Birth year of actor or actress.
parameters.birth_pl: US State where the actor or actress was born, country if foreign.
parameters.oscar_yr: Year the Oscar ceremony was held.
parameters.birth_date: Birth date of actor or actress.
parameters.movie: Name of movie actor or actress got the Oscar for.
parameters.age: Age at which the actor or actress won the Oscar.
parameters.birth_d: Birth day of actor or actress.
parameters.birth_mo: Birth month of actor or actress.

title: Oscar winners, 1929 to 2018
description:
Description
Best actor and actress Oscar winners from 1929 to 2018
reference:
Although there have been only 84 Oscar ceremonies until 2012, there are 85
male winners and 85 female winners because ties happened on two occasions
(1933 for the best actor and 1969 for the best actress).
format: A data frame with 182 observations on the following 10 variables.
